subject: Implement Phase 3.3: Comparison Manager & View Components
body:
Add the core UI components for Compare Mode:

- comparison-manager.js: Full panel for managing saved options
  - List, load, delete, rename saved comparisons
  - Edit notes for each comparison
  - Select options for side-by-side comparison
  - Export to JSON/CSV, import from JSON
  - Clear all with confirmation dialog
  - Storage info display

- comparison-view.js: Side-by-side comparison table
  - Compare 2-4 options simultaneously
  - Developer, Buyer, Combined metrics sections
  - Transfer pricing risk display
  - Difference column with directional arrows
  - Best/worst value highlighting
  - Export comparison as JSON/CSV

- calculator.js: Integration updates
  - Import and initialize comparison components
  - Wire up "View Saved" and "Compare" buttons
  - Add cleanup for comparison modules

This substantially completes Phase 3 (Compare Mode) of the
implementation plan.
